client
Class MessageReceiverImpl

java.lang.Object
  client.MessageReceiverImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageReceiver, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
public class MessageReceiverImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageReceiver, java.io.Serializable

This class is an implementation of client side message receiver used to handle messages from the remote server to the client

See Also:
